channel.title: July2025 on LRG
channel.description: Recent content in July2025 on LRG

item.title: July 23rd, 2025 12:51
item.description:
I am so ready for a break. What I really need is something social, away from computers and phones. Listen to some music. Touch some grass. Stuff my face with tasty food. Sleep.

Chances of this happening in the near future? Close to zero.
